name: Once Upon a Tile
description:
Once upon a tile is a game where you have to figure it out what tiles you have to step in and in which order, so you can summon portals, open doors and finding secret keys.

Control an insane mage walking through the spiritual realm. You need to learn the element sequence for the spells to walk through the land and reach all the portals.

Commands:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump

Global Game Jam entry page: https://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/once-upon-tile
